commandDescription.en-US: Tells you where to check the upcoming milestones of the game
commandDescription.fr: Te dit où consulter les futurs jalons du jeu
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz onde checar as próximas metas do jogo

help.en-US: Type `/$<commandName>` to know where to check the upcoming milestones of the game
help.fr: Tape `/$<commandName>` pour savoir où consulter les futurs jalons du jeu
help.pt-BR: Digite `/$<commandName>` pra saber onde checar as próximas metas do jogo

reply.en-US: $<intent> check upcoming milestones of the game [there](<$<link>>).
reply.fr: $<intent> consulter de futurs jalons du jeu [là](<$<link>>).
reply.pt-BR: $<intent> checar as próximas metas do jogo [aqui](<$<link>>).

intentWithChannel.en-US: Before suggesting an idea in $<channel>, you can
intentWithChannel.fr: Avant de suggérer une idée dans $<channel>, tu peux
intentWithChannel.pt-BR: Antes de sugerir uma ideia em $<channel>, você pode
